projects.title: What Should I Watch - Ai Movie Recommendation App
projects.description: 'What Should I Watch', an AI-driven platform that offers personalized movie recommendations based on users' emotions and preferences. Developed user-friendly interface, advanced algorithms, and integrated with popular streaming platforms.

projects.title: Mailio - Personal Ai E-mail assistant
projects.description: Mailio is an innovative chat and email assistant designed to optimize professional communication. With its intelligent features and real-time suggestions, Mailio facilitates the composition of effective messages, ensuring clarity and professionalism in interactions. By streamlining workflows, saving time, and enhancing messaging skills, Mailio empowers users to maximize their communication efficiency.

projects.title: OZXK Blog | Full Stack React Project
projects.description: This is a personal blog site that showcases my skills in building complex web applications using cutting-edge technologies. Using React, Next.js, and SASS, I created a fast and responsive website with a modern design that highlights my content. To make updating the site easier, I designed and implemented a content management system using Node.js and MongoDB. The CMS allows me to create and edit blog posts, as well as manage various settings on the website, all in one convenient location. If you're interested in seeing the code behind the project, you can find it on Github.

projects.title: Safran Plise | E-Commerce Website
projects.description: Safran Plise is an e-commerce and customer relationship management (CRM) website developed using WordPress. The site's user-friendly design allows customers to easily browse and purchase products, while the CRM system enables the business to manage customer interactions and track sales. The site's elegant and modern layout ensures that customers have an enjoyable and seamless shopping experience. With features such as a search bar, product categories, and product filtering, Safran Plise's e-commerce platform is tailored to meet the needs of today's online shoppers.

projects.title: Zarif Akademi | Learning Management System
projects.description: Zarif Akademi is a learning management system (LMS) developed using WordPress. The site's intuitive design and advanced features enable educators to easily create and manage online courses, while students can enjoy a seamless learning experience. The LMS includes a range of features such as course creation, lesson plans, quizzes, assignments, and progress tracking. With Zarif Akademi's LMS, educators can create engaging and interactive online courses that help students achieve their learning objectives.

projects.title: Karabuk Evim Nakliyat | Local Business Website
projects.description: Karabuk Evim Nakliyat is a local business website developed using WordPress. The site's modern and responsive design enables visitors to easily navigate and learn about the company's moving services. The website includes a contact form, enabling customers to easily get in touch and request a quote for their moving needs. With a focus on user experience and functionality, Karabuk Evim Nakliyat's website is designed to help the company stand out and attract new customers.

projects.title: Hidro-Pir | Industrial Business Website
projects.description: Hidro-Pir is an industrial business website developed using WordPress. The site's professional and modern design showcases the company's products and services, while enabling visitors to easily learn about the company's capabilities. The website includes a contact form, enabling customers to easily get in touch and request more information about the company's products and services. With a focus on user experience and functionality, Hidro-Pir's website is designed to help the company establish a strong online presence and attract new customers.
